Welcome to MythTV leanfront
MythTV leanfront is designed for Android TV. Touch screen control does not work properly. The application reacts to the touch screen, but it is not usable. It may be possible to run it on a phone or tablet if you attach a remote control or a keyboard. If you want to try it anyway, tap the banner below.
